#summary Details of Serial Slave Mode.

= Introduction =

A bi-direction communications mode that allows a PC to directly control the motions of the robot either at a frame bt frame level using raw wCK commands or at a scene by scene level. The user can also query all sensors getting the result in either hex or decimal. This mode also will operate in either ascii mode or binary.

= Details =

{{{
Serial Slave mode: inMotion=%d, F_PLAYING=%d
m: load motion (binary)
q: query robot status
d: query servo positions in decimal form
p: basic pose
.: read one byte from wCK bus
x: load data directly into wCK bus
<ESC>: exit Serial Slave mode
}}}
